0.d0: obs nums doesnt seem to be used currently
0.d1: firing frames and smoka_init_frames produced by ch
0.d2: ab is on format [[frame, alpha, bright]]. Then use ab_clock. things should get darker and redder. IT is relative to LAST ONE

move.d0: ld: left down, scale_start: relative to orig pic, y_mid: 1.0 means all the scaling is above ld. frame_ss denotes start/stop
move.d1: OBS ld_start/end corrsponds MANUALLY with scale_ss TODO assertions for frame_ss
move.d2: y_mid removed. OBS weird case of missing piece of pic when scale_ss is [1.0, 0.1]. Also when scale starts at < 1 it seems weird
